com.jidesoft.paging
Class AbstractPageNavigationSupport

java.lang.Object
  com.jidesoft.paging.AbstractPageNavigationSupport
All Implemented Interfaces:
PageNavigationSupport
public abstract class AbstractPageNavigationSupport
extends Object
implements PageNavigationSupport

AbstractPageNavigationSupport is an abstract implementation of PageNavigationSupport. It implements almost all the interface methods except getTotalRecordCount and setTotalRecordCount.
